title: Geography of South America: the continent
brief_description: The main geographical features of South America, including the Andes, the Guiana and Brazilian highlands, and the Orinoco, Amazon and Plata-Parana River Basions. The relationships of these geographic factors to the people and their ways of life. Survey of agriculture, industry, commerce, cities and culture.
